tasks.task: Operating and maintaining precision agricultural equipment
subtasks: Collecting soil samples for nutrient analysis
Monitoring crop health through satellite imagery
Adjusting machinery settings for variable rate application
Transferring data from sensors to analysis software
Customizing fertilizer or pesticide application rates
Adjusting machinery operation based on variable rates
Processing drone footage to assess crop health

subtasks: Ensuring technological access in rural areas
